extendedInfo.description: A Glass Digital Clock widget size 4x2It features:============â 212 skins to choose fromâ 12 or 24 hour modeâ Portrait or Landscape modeâ Color choice for all information displayed on the widgetâ System Information on the widget front or as a pop-up window â Shows battery level on the widgetâ Shows Moon phase on the widget thats is calculated automatically each day.â Current Weather conditions which include:   +Current temperature in Fahrenheit or Celsius   +Feels like Temperature   +Humidity   +Wind speed in Km or miles per hourâ 2 Weather layouts on clock widget(user selected from configuration screen)â 2 Forecast layouts(user selected from configuration screen)â 4 Day weather forecast that includes for each day:   +High and Low temperature   +Precipitation percentage   +Weather descriptionâ Sunrise/Sunset times in either Forecast screensâ 37 unique weather condition iconsâ Widget hotspots for interaction   +tap bottom right widget corner->return to configuration screen   +tap bottom left widget corner->popup system information window   +tap weather icon->launch forecast screen   +tap Hours tab->launch anything!(user selected from configuration screen)   +tap Minutes tab->launch anything!(user selected from configuration screen)STEPS HOW TO ADD A WIDGET==========================1.On your Android home screen, tap any blank or âemptyâ area with size 4x2 and hold down your finger.2.An âAdd to Home screenâ window will pop up. From that window, tap âWidgetsâ.3.Youâll be presented with a list of all the installed Widgets on your Android device.4.Select the "3D Digital Weather Clockâ to add to your home screen by tapping it.Notes=====- "Time frozen/not updating"-> taskiller killed the clock(exclude it from taskillers)- When phone starts, clock starts in less than a min too.- "Cannot find/Cannot Open/Cannot Launch"-> read instructions above how to add widgets on your home screen, or step by step instructions in your application drawer.ROM users-> make sure the clock is NOT moved on SD card.Widgets are not supposed to be on SD card. Move it back to the phone storage.Weather hint: For world destinations with two words in the name, type in the box the words with a plus sign.For example "Buenos Aires" type "Buenos+Aires",remember the "+" sign -no spaces, don't include the quotes.Email problems/suggestionsCheck our website for more help.EXCLUDE IT FROM TASKILLERS!!!Be polite, this is a free app :-)VIDEO HOW TO ADD WIDGETShttp://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DpMLF9b2aTQ

reviews.title: Wish you could save your set ups..
reviews.comment: Mine crashes occasionally.. droid 3.. I only wish I could save the colors and options instead of having to do it over each times.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Forecast needs improving
reviews.comment: Great app, but doesn\'t tell you the current day\'s  forecast.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Truly my number one app for years now.
reviews.comment: But must uninstall, it disappeared one day and widget will not come back even after several installs :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dennis
reviews.comment: Had to try 3 times to install ... able to use on Galaxy 3 with their home screen  overlayed on top of screen for screensaver .... it  works, prefer Galaxy S setup
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best Weather Widget
reviews.comment: Low space and memory consumption. Love it with lots of differnt skins to use.
reviews.author: Santosh Manjrekar

reviews.comment: I deleted the clock thing that came with the phone and every time i try to het another one it says i need a widget.
reviews.author: Logan Stewart

reviews.title: Love looks but troublesome
reviews.comment: Great looking, useful app but have had it hang more than once and weather fails sometimes. Went to reinstall it today and it fails to let me pick city for weather by zip code or name.  Worked for long time then failed 3 or 4 times including today.
reviews.author: Larry Bancroft

reviews.title: Fail
reviews.comment: Didn\'t even have my city.... don\'t bother downloading unless you live in a big city...
reviews.author: Usmaan Alam

reviews.title: Great Widget
reviews.comment: Works well...does everything it says it does. Haven\'t had issues yet. Gs3 running adw launcher JB theme
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: THOMAS
reviews.comment: Really love your app especially since the lattest update, but as long as it still retains the adds it will never rate above four stars with me. The least you could do is offer a paid version for those of us that do not want the adds.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Odd Behavior
reviews.comment: Hmm. A clock widget that doesn\'t update in real time! Have to turn screen off and back on to know time. Nearly wrecked numerous dates. Why use a clock that doesn\'t keep time? Its pretty, though.
reviews.author: Sherma Patibanda

reviews.title: Better than old version
reviews.comment: I have similar widget on Galaxy2 and this has more options for displayand looks a lot better. So far I am pleased with this widget.
reviews.author: Mike O

reviews.title: Clock
reviews.comment: Clock stays at whatever time is showing when using the phone. So after using let\'s say the internet browser for five minutes, the clock will be five minutes behind.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: uninstalled
reviews.comment: because I got tired of the errors when I drop Internet connectivity for a few minutes. should be a no-error-notice option.
reviews.author: James Hall

reviews.title: Good job....
reviews.comment: Any chance of geolocation for the weather? And choice of fonts for the clock numbers? More weather skins would be a great upgrade also.
reviews.author: Denis Evangelou

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: This app looks good and has the functions you can ask for in a widget, but it crashes now and then, I\'d say a few times per week even.
reviews.author: Fredrik Yrwing

reviews.title: xperia arc s
reviews.comment: it shows us informations we need on widget and looks good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exelent
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: harsha jayarathna

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: Intellegent
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Aggravating
reviews.comment: Tried the task killer recommendations to avoid the clock freezing and it continues with issues.
reviews.author: A Google User
